Title: Requires a notice for renewal of certain policies be delivered at least ninety days prior to the expiration of such policy
Summary: Requires a notice of a change in premium for a renewal of a commercial insurance policy shall be mailed or delivered at least ninety days in advance of the expiration date of such policy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring a notice for renewal of certain policies be delivered at least ninety days prior to the expiration of such policy
